scripts.build-editor: npm run build-editor:deps --workspaces=false || echo deps installed & node ./editor-build/node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config editor-build/webpack.config.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('lab','editor-build','build');const dest=path.join('lab','src','public','vendor','ckeditor');fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});['ckeditor.js','ckeditor.js.map'].forEach(f=>{if(fs.existsSync(path.join(src,f))) fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f), path.join(dest,f));});console.log('Copied build to vendor/ckeditor');"
scripts.build-editor:deps: npm install --no-audit --no-fund --prefix editor-build @ckeditor/ckeditor5-editor-classic @ckeditor/ckeditor5-essentials @ckeditor/ckeditor5-paragraph @ckeditor/ckeditor5-heading @ckeditor/ckeditor5-basic-styles @ckeditor/ckeditor5-link @ckeditor/ckeditor5-list @ckeditor/ckeditor5-alignment @ckeditor/ckeditor5-block-quote @ckeditor/ckeditor5-code-block @ckeditor/ckeditor5-table @ckeditor/ckeditor5-horizontal-line @ckeditor/ckeditor5-remove-format @ckeditor/ckeditor5-dev-utils @ckeditor/ckeditor5-dev-translations @babel/preset-env babel-loader raw-loader terser-webpack-plugin webpack webpack-cli ts-loader
scripts.build-react-editor: npm install --no-audit --no-fund --prefix react-editor && npm run build --prefix react-editor
